welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cremlingen, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in our rich culture and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braunschweig Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Braunschweig Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A cargo terminal used for freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
